description: This file provides utility functions for managing an inbox stored in localStorage for an admin interface in a learning platform. It includes functions to retrieve, append, clear, and subscribe to changes in inbox items, which are structured as flat objects containing email data and optional PDFs, with special handling for data URLs and base64 data.

methods.name: getInboxItems()
methods.description: Retrieves the list of inbox items from localStorage, handling parse errors and SSR environments.

methods.name: appendInboxItem(item)
methods.description: Adds a new inbox item to localStorage, normalizing PDF data URLs and preventing corruption.

methods.name: clearInbox()
methods.description: Clears all inbox items from localStorage (intended for development use).

methods.name: subscribe(callback)
methods.description: Sets up event listeners to observe changes to the inbox across tabs and in-tab, and invokes callback on updates.
